ygData.subject: New Book Finally In Print: Why Greatness Cannot Be Planned
ygData.msgSnippet: Joel Lehman and I are pleased to announce the publication of our new book by Springer: Why Greatness Cannot Be Planned: The Myth of the Objective You can get
